text: The municipality is located in Krapina-Zagorje County in northern Croatia Tuhelj is a village and municipality in Krapina-Zagorje County in Croatia. According to the 2011 census, there are 2,104 inhabitants in the area, the majority of which are Croats. Tuhelj is famous for its spa, and mud which is rich in Chromium. The parish church in Tuhelj is home to a Crucifixion sculpture by Antun Augustinčić.Antun Augustinčić (Klanjec, 4.5.1900 - Zagreb, 10.5.1978.) ==References== Category:Populated places in Krapina-Zagorje County Category:Municipalities of Croatia Category:Spa towns in Croatia
title: Tuhelj
